notes: Province total from Table 1: 22 outbreaks (open 22, closed 0).
Gauteng: 73 affected properties; ~63,000 animals slaughtered (report). Municipalities listed in text.
KZN: total confirmed 200 outbreaks (181 unresolved; 19 closed). Mtubatuba diptank: SAT1 detected.
Mpumalanga: outbreak detected in Gert Sibande (April 2025); table lists total 17 outbreaks in province.
North West: total 30 properties affected; municipalities listed in text.
Humansdorp: 39 farms positive; 36 farms pre-emptively vaccinated; DMA declared 26 Jul 2024 and rescinded 15 Jun 2025. (Text describes clinical detection April 2024).
Outbreak reported on a commercial farm in Moqhaka local municipality on 09 July 2025.
Mtubatuba: cattle at a diptank confirmed FMD positive; SAT1 identified; further surrounding diptanks negative.
